slide.title: Xdebug branch coverage output
slide.example: A HIT ifthenelse - branches - 00; OP: 00-04; line: 02-04 HIT; out1: 05 HIT; out2: 08 HIT - 05; OP: 05-07; line: 05-06 HIT; out1: 08 HIT - 08; OP: 08-09; line: 07-07 HIT; out1: 10 HIT; out2: 13 HIT - 10; OP: 10-12; line: 08-09 HIT; out1: 13 HIT - 13; OP: 13-14; line: 10-10 HIT; out1: EX X - paths - 0 5 8 10 13: X - 0 5 8 13: HIT - 0 8 10 13: HIT - 0 8 13: X
